title: Gladiator
production_studio: DreamWorks, Universal Pictures, Scott Free Productions
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
production_studio: Sony Pictures Classics, Columbia Pictures Film Production Asia
description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

title: Traffic
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published
description: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a cocaine addict.

title: Erin Brockovich
production_studio: Universal Pictures, Columbia Pictures, Jersey Films
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

title: Almost Famous
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: A high-school boy in the early 1970s is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

title: Memento
description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: Requiem for a Dream
description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

title: Cast Away
description: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after a crash landing on a deserted island.

title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
production_studio: Touchstone Pictures, Universal Pictures, Working Title Films
description: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

title: American Psycho
production_studio: Lions Gate Films, Edward R. Pressman Film
description: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

title: Chocolat
description: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

title: Meet the Parents
description: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

title: X-Men
description: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an impending war: the militant Brotherhood of Mutants and the pacifist X-Men.

title: High Fidelity
description: A record store owner and compulsive list maker recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

title: Best in Show
description: A look at the hilarious and often absurd world of dog shows.

title: Unbreakable
description: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

title: Snatch
description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

title: Battle Royale
description: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary 'Battle Royale' act.

title: Amores Perros
description: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

title: In the Mood for Love
description: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

title: Wonder Boys
description: An English professor who is struggling with writer's block has a chaotic weekend with his eccentric editor, his pregnant lover, and a gifted but troubled student.

title: Yi Yi
description: Each member of a family in Taipei asks big questions about the meaning of life as they live through everyday struggles.

title: You Can Count on Me
description: A single mother's life is thrown into turmoil when her dysfunctional brother comes to stay with her.

title: The Emperor's New Groove
description: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

title: Chicken Run
description: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

title: Quills
description: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the Marquis de Sade, directs a play starring his fellow inmates.

title: What Lies Beneath
description: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

title: The Perfect Storm
production_studio: Warner Bros., Baltimore Spring Creek Productions
description: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

title: The Patriot
description: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

title: Before Night Falls
description: The story of the life of Cuban poet and novelist Reinaldo Arenas.

title: Billy Elliot
description: A talented young boy's life is changed when he discovers a love for dance, but he must overcome the prejudices of his working-class family and community.

title: Remember the Titans
production_studio: Walt Disney Pictures, Jerry Bruckheimer Films
description: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

title: Dancer in the Dark
description: An Eastern European immigrant in a rural American town who is going blind tries to save money for an operation for her son, who has the same condition.

title: The Contender
description: A senator is nominated to be the new Vice President, but a sex scandal from her past threatens her confirmation.

title: Wonder Boys
description: An English professor who is struggling with writer's block has a chaotic weekend with his eccentric editor, his pregnant lover, and a gifted but troubled student.

title: Final Destination
description: A teenager has a premonition of a plane crash, and he and his friends are saved from the disaster. But they soon find that they cannot escape their fate.
